Data Fields
sg_font_hdr_t Struct Reference

Defines the header for a monochrome bitmap font. More...

#include <sg_font_types.h>

Detailed Description

A monochrome bitmap font looks like this in memory (or a file):

sg_font_hdr_t hdr; sg_font_char_t char0; sg_font_char_t char1; ... sg_font_char_t char94; const char char0_data[char0.height][MFont::byte_width(char0.width)]; const char char1_data[char1.height][MFont::byte_width(char1.width)]; ... const char char94_data[char0.height][MFont::byte_width(char94.width)]; sg_font_kerning_pair_t kerning0; sg_font_kerning_pair_t kerning1; ...

Data Fields

u8 num_chars
 
u8 max_byte_width
 
u8 max_height
 
u32 size
 
u16 kerning_pairs
 

Field Documentation

u16 sg_font_hdr_t::kerning_pairs

Number of kerning pairs stored in the font

u8 sg_font_hdr_t::max_byte_width

Max number of bytes per line of a font

u8 sg_font_hdr_t::max_height

Maximum height of a character

u8 sg_font_hdr_t::num_chars

Number of characters in a font

u32 sg_font_hdr_t::size

Number of bytes the font occupies
